description: Installation of new air handling plant at roof level and associated mechanical and electrical services at level 1, 2 and 3, including internal structural alterations to facilitate this. Associated works and alterations.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

OS Map; College Building - City University Tender Stage 2 Documentation; A L2 200; A L3 200; 551(P)-020; 551(P)-120; 551(P)-122; 551(P)-125; A L1 200; 551(P)-670; 551(P)-250; 551(P)-240; 551(P)-126; Drawings from Flaktwoods x 5 A4 Pages; Flaktwoods Air handling Unit eQ Specs x 9 pages; eQ Air handling Unit Air Magic by Flakt Woods Brochure; Design and Access Statement- June 2011

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
